LinkForIP.PluginDescription: A Piwik plugin for you put link to see information about IP visitor.
LinkForIP.SettingsDescription: Settings for LinkForIP, this plugin is very easy to configurate.
LinkForIP.UrlHelp: Enter a url with '{ip}' joker for create link on visitor list. Example:
LinkForIP.UrlErrUrlInvalid: Invalid url, you need to add valid url address with '{ip}' joker
LinkForIP.UrlErrNoJoker: Invalid url, you need to add '{ip}' joker on url
